Game.Name: Dragon's Rock (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Dragon's Rock is a 2D Platformer game, developed by Independent Arts and published by East Entertainment Media, which was released in Europe in 2006.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/959382.html
Game.Notes: Dragon's Rock is an Action game, developed by Independent Arts and published by East Entertainment Media, which was released in Europe in 2006.
